text: ystrophy ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of myotonic dystrophy:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Myotonic Dystrophy Type 1  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Myotonic Dystrophy Type 2  - Genetic Testing Registry: Myotonic dystrophy type 2  - Genetic Testing Registry: Steinert myotonic dystrophy syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Muscular Dystrophy  - University of Washington: Myotonic Dystrophy: Making an Informed Choice About Genetic Testing   These resources from MedlinePlus off
